title: Anyway to Check Kayn Icon Progress?
body: I'm trying to unlock the icons through the "Play 5 games as, with, or against Shadow Assassin Kayn/Darkin Kayn" way but there are no missions or anything of the sort to track down how much games I've played that had a Kayn in it (These icons are available until August 13th so no I did not miss out on them if that's what you were going to say). I think Riot HQ has some sort of tracker, otherwise how else would they know who to gift the icons to? If any Rioters/players have access to that info/know a way for us to see progress or can straight up just tell me my progress, it would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body: I looked into this for you, but it doesn't look like you have Kayn unlocked.  You'll need to have him unlocked to get missions specific to that.  Hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HETOuHKy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-27T22:24:43.446+0000)
>
> I looked into this for you, but it doesn't look like you have Kayn unlocked.  You'll need to have him unlocked to get missions specific to that.  Hope that helps clear things up!

Thanks alot!
